channel.title: World of Gamma: The War Hall Heist (Tuesdays in January)
channel.description:
## The Pitch
World of Gamma is an homage to the 70s and 80s TSR game Gamma World. In this lightweight PbtA game, players assume the roles of mutated animals in a zany post-apocalyptic world fraught with competitive factions, creepy flora, and barely recognizable landmarks.
----
## At-A-Glance
* **System** : World of Gamma (a PbtA homage to 1980s Gamma World) * **The Pitch** : Mutant animals adventuring around a familiar post-apocalyptic USA * **Schedule** : Four Tuesdays in January x 2.5-hours/session * **Breaks** : Two 10-minute breaks * **Tone** : Creepy mutations; Exploration; Survival * **Venue** : GM’s Zoom * **Recording Session** : With consent from all players * **Posting Recording** : With consent from all players * **Attendance** : Joining all four sessions is ideal but not required * **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players
This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)
